items.summary: In Section 3 (CustomCarpetsCtaSection) within the selected container (/html/body/div/div/main/section[3]/div[1]), change the main heading text to exactly: "Why People Choose Us !!".

In Section 3, increase the visual size of the "Capabilities" label located at XPath /html/body/div/div/main/section[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/h3[1] (currently the h3 with text "Capabilities").

In Section 3, update the supporting/last line paragraph at XPath /html/body/div/div/main/section[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/p[2] to exactly: "Created in collaboration with interior designers, tailored to each space."

In Section 3, replace the current hero image with a seamless carpet pattern/texture image (do not use the current "custom-project-cover" workspace image). Update the to reference the newly generated texture asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, and update the alt text to accurately describe a seamless carpet texture/pattern.
